title: Ep 316 | Phil Finally Learns He’s a Rich Redneck & Jase Gives a Drugstore Devotional
description:
Phil discovers that rich rednecks know how to plant some crops, or in his case, duck food. Jase goes to a trucking conference and finds out the people who attend are not, in fact, truckers. He also learns that his jokes go over many people’s heads — especially Missy’s. Jase shares his faith with people in a drugstore. Phil and Jase talk about how it’s not our role to judge people’s life decisions but rather to bring them to Jesus. And Phil and Jase talk about the warning that Noah gave to all the people of the world and how their response relates to modern times. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
